did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of California, Los Angeles. Library. Department of Special Collections.

did.abstract: John Waldie (1781-1862) was the administrator of Hendersyde Park at Kelso, Roxburghshire, Scotland. The collection consists of 7 volumes of letters to John Waldie (1793-1841), 74 journal volumes, 11 volumes on travels transcribed from the journals, and 1 volume of passports (1827-1837).
did.physloc: Stored off-site at SRLF. Advance notice is required for access to the collection. Please contact the UCLA Library, Department of Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Reproduction
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical object belong to the UCLA Library, Department of Special Collections. Literary rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Advance notice required for access.

altformavail.head: Additional Physical Form Available
altformavail.p: A copy of the original version of this online finding aid is available at the UCLA Department of Special Collections for in-house consultation and may be obtained for a fee. Please contact:

list.item: UCLA Library, Department of Special Collections
Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], John Waldie Papers (Collection 169). Department of Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, UCLA.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Waldie was born in 1781; attended University of Edinburgh; awarded D.Lit; assumed the administration of Hendersyde Park at Kelso, Roxburghshire, Scotland, shortly before the death of his father, George Waldie, in 1826; traveled extensively in Europe; he died in 1862.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of 7 volumes of letters to John Waldie (1793-1841), 74 journal volumes, 11 volumes on travels transcribed from the journals, and 1 volume of passports (1827-1837). Includes an eyewitness narrative of the Battle of Waterloo in 1815. Journals provide commentary on the music, art, and theater of the period in Britain and Europe.

arrangement.head: Organization and Arrangement
arrangement.p:
Arranged in the following series:
Collection is arranged chronologically.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

did.unittitle: Letters Addressed to John Waldie Esquire

scopecontent.p: Containing travels in Holland, Flanders, & France in 1802.

list.item: Travels in Falnders, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, France.
Part 1 of Continental travels (July 15, 1816-August 31, 1817) in 6 vol.

scopecontent.p: Journals of travels to France, Spain, Italy & Germany in 1818, 1819, 1820 (vol.1).
Travels in France, Spain, Italy & Germany, 1818-1820 (vol.2).
Travels, vol.2; Germany, Italy, Switzerland, France, 1827 & 1828.
Travels, vol.3; Germany, Styria, Carniola, Italy, Switzerland, France in 1827 & 1828.
Including five months residence in Paris.
Travels, vol.2; France, Savoy, Italy, Sicily, Malta, Part of Switzerland.
Travels, vol.1 begins August 13, after p.45.
Travels, vol.2; France, Switzerland, Savoy, Italy, Ionian islands, Greece, Asia Minor, Turkey, Hungary, Austria, etc.
Travels, vol.5; begins Clermont, ends London.

list.item: Travels, 6 weeks in Belgium, Rhenish Prussia & Nassau, 1842. vol. ends in London.

scopecontent.p: A winter in Paris, being nearly 7 months absence from Paris.
Travels, vol.1 begins October 1, p.397. Journey to Lyons.
Travels, vol.2; Switzerland, Italy, winter in Rome.
Hendersyde Park, 74 years, 9 months age-February 1, 1856. Has a 1600 volume library.

did.unittitle: Journal of a tour in Holland, Flanders, and France in the year 1802.
Journal of travels in Flanders, Holland, and France in the year 1815.
Journals of travels in Flanders, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, and France in the years 1816 and 1817.
Journal of travels in France, Spain, Italy, and Germany in the years 1818, 1819 and 1820.
Travels in Germany, Styria, Carniola & Istria, Italy, Switzerland, and France in 1827 and 1828.
Journal of a four month absence from England in the summer of 1815.

list.item: Including a tour in Flanders, Holland, and France and a short residence at Brussels and Paris.
[A manuscript transcription of Waterloo Days by Jane Waldie Watts]
